title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo with the self-hosted LLM runner, CLI, and Go library to pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama REST API; installable via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool usage.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Popular open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama backends; runs in Docker with one command.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit integration that lets you spin up a shareable chat UI backed by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j) with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts to bulk pull, convert, quantize, and benchmark GGUF models for Ollama.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Lightweight React front-end that talks to the local Ollama REST API; packaged as a static PWA.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams responses from local Ollama models into any channel.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST wrapper that exposes Ollama endpoints with user quotas and per-model caching.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with optional thread persistence.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library (NuGet: OllamaSharp) for chatting, embedding, and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client (Hex: ollama) wrapping Ollama REST with Finch/Tesla and GenServer streaming.
